snippet: F. Lee Bailey, the lawyer who represented O. J. Simpson and Patty Hearst, had been denied his request to practice law in Maine.
abstract: F Lee Bailey, prominent lawyer who represented O J Simpson and Patty Hearst, has been denied his requests to practice law in Maine.
lead_paragraph: F. Lee Bailey, the lawyer who represented O. J. Simpson and Patty Hearst, had been denied his request to practice law in Maine.
